reuters.title: STANDARD OIL SETS 154 MLN SWISS FRANC NOTE WITH 3-1/4 PCT COUPON AND CURRENCY WARRANTS
reuters.body: Shr 10 cts vs nine cts Net 388,000 vs 328,000 Sales 7.1 mln vs 4.1 mln Avg shrs 4,066,309 vs 3,688,890 Year Shr 37 cts vs 30 cts Net 1,415,000 vs 955,000 Sales 27 mln vs 13.1 mln Avg shrs 3,849,659 vs 3,133,446 Reuter 
